The image highlights that real stocking wholesale suppliers are certified by Infinity Phoenix.” title_text=”Warehouse WBI Certified”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” type=”2_3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″ text_font_size=”16px”]

About Infinity Phoenix

Founded in 1999, Infinity Phoenix Inc. has been at the forefront of connecting retailers with certified wholesalers and dropshippers. We’ve helped businesses of all sizes – from small home-based sellers to established retailers by providing a reliable Directory of top-tier wholesale suppliers.

At Infinity Phoenix, we don’t rely on algorithms or automated processes to ensure quality. Our team is deeply committed to maintaining the highest standards by personally qualifying and verifying every wholesaler and dropshipper listed in our Directory. We use tradeshows, confirm warehouses and conduct detailed research to ensure that each supplier is genuine, factory-authorized and trustworthy.

But we don’t stop there. We also actively monitor and investigate Member feedback to address any issues or concerns. If a supplier fails to meet our standards, they are promptly removed. This hands-on approach guarantees that you’re always working with suppliers who are not only legitimate but also dedicated to helping your business succeed.

When you join Infinity Phoenix, you’re not just getting access to a Directory – you are partnering with a team that genuinely cares about your success. That’s why, after more than two decades, we remain the most trusted source for Certified Wholesalers and Dropshippers. Our WBI Certified Seal stands as a promise that you’re connecting with suppliers you can count on, ensuring the safety of your business and customers. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” column_structure=”1_3,2_3″][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” type=”1_3″][et_pb_image src=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Linkin.png” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″ alt=”Interior view of a large, organized wholesale warehouse with rows of shelves of boxes. The image highlights that real stocking wholesale suppliers are certified by Infinity Phoenix.” title_text=”Linkin” width=”80.8%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” type=”2_3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″ text_font_size=”16px” custom_padding=”0px|||||”]

Meet Linkin
Our Mascot

Linking People with Opportunity – that’s our motto and mission at Infinity Phoenix. We believe there’s tremendous potential to make money online; you just need to know where to look and how to avoid the scam artists and pitfalls that many fall victim to.

Our mascot, Linkin, is named not only because he helps connect you with real opportunities, but also as a tribute to “Honest Abe” Lincoln, reflecting our commitment to honesty and integrity.

At Infinity Phoenix, we work tirelessly to find legitimate wholesale suppliers for our online directory, so our members can easily “link” or “connect” with them.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” type=”4_4″][et_pb_divider admin_label=”Trust Pilot Review” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”28px|25px|28px|25px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#0C71C3″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Instrumental in Helping Us

After spending 34 years in a very successful insurance agency, we thought that it was time to make more time at home and start a new venture. The Infinity Phoenix web site has been very instrumental in helping us.

Roy

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”28px|25px|28px|25px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#0C71C3″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Greatest Resource

Infinity Phoenix is the greatest resource I ever invested in!

Denise

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”28px|25px|28px|25px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#0C71C3″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

I Am A Paid Member

I am a paid member and really enjoy using your services. I have started a small business and although it has been rocky I do see some progress using real wholesalers as opposed to scammers and middlemen. I wait impatiently for your newsletter, which I enjoy reading and your recommendations. Every cent I have paid for your services and products have been worth it. Thank you

Pete

Check out the Free Preview of the Directory of WBI Certified Wholesalers and see for yourself what makes our directory so valuable.

You’ll get a glimpse of the top-quality, genuine wholesale suppliers we have meticulously verified and certified.

Our Directory is designed to help online sellers like you find reliable dropshippers and bulk suppliers, ensuring you have access to the best products at true wholesale prices.

Don’t miss this opportunity to explore the benefits of working with certified wholesalers and take your online business to the next level!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/free-preview/” button_text=”Get the Free Preview” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”1bffc0fc-42a0-49d1-bd9a-ae3ade2d7206″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”16px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#E09900″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”20px” button_font=”|700|||||||” custom_padding=”12px|24px|12px|24px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover_enabled=”off|desktop” custom_padding__hover=”|28px||20px|true|false” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: About Infinity Phoenix Founded in 1999, Infinity Phoenix Inc. has been at the forefront of connecting retailers with certified wholesalers and dropshippers. We’ve helped businesses of all sizes – from small home-based sellers to established retailers by providing a reliable Directory of top-tier wholesale suppliers. At Infinity Phoenix, we don’t rely on algorithms or automated […]
